Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Penn in 1953...
Traded from Penn to West Texas on 3/1/1953 (Going to PEN: P D. Studdard. Going to WT: P K. Chappell)...
Injured on 4/10/1954 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 8/22/1954 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from West Texas to Boston (UBA) on 4/1/1957 (Going to WT: RF B. Serpa. Going to PIL: P K. Chappell, P J. Heron, P J. Agin)...
Earned first career win on 5/19/1957...
Had first career hit (triple) on 8/26/1957, off Gary Martone (LP)...
Injured on 4/23/1958 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/29/1958 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/1/1959 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/24/1959 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Injured on 6/29/1961 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/30/1962 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 7 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 2/7/1966 to a 1-year deal worth $360,000 per year...
Drafted in 3rd round, 68th overall pick, by West Texas in 1967...
Injured on 7/10/1972 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/22/1976 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Released by West Texas on 11/3/1976...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 11/3/1976 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/16/1977 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 6/12/1977...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1980, going 4-1, 1.07...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1981, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1981, going 22-4, 1.65 ERA...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1984, winning 2 games with a 0.53 ERA...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
